name: joint the yarn - swap magic yarn - match game for all
name_original: joint the yarn - swap magic yarn - match game for all
description:
Magic yarn swap ,a new match 3 logic puzzle game with creative concept is available for free to play.
Shuffle all yarn balls, threads, buttons and enjoy this free yarn game.
Swap or tap on objects to make combination of 3 or more yarn objects and make best match.
Get scissor booster to complete level.

Two modes are there:

*** Arcade mode : Complete level before time gets over.
*** Classic Mode : Get bonus score and play without timer.
Try to complete level fast to get best high score.

Features:

=> Ultimate booster effect to collapse all sewing objects.
=> Best graphics quality.
=> Woolen threads, buttons, yarn balls etc with stunning colors.
=> 3 Worlds with 250 + levels.
=> Collapse objects with ease and watch best flip and shutter effect.
